data.text: Yahweh gave me another message
to proclaim to everyone in Jerusalem. He said that I should tell them this [MET]:
At that time you Israelis ◄were set apart/belonged only► to me;
So, you descendants of [MTY] Jacob, all you people of [MTY] Israel,
listen to what Yahweh says:
They did not say, ‘Yahweh brought us safely out of Egypt,
And when I brought you into a very fertile land,
Your priests also did not say,
“So, I will accuse you in court.
If you go west to the island of Cyprus,
The people of no other nation have ever [RHQ] abandoned their gods that they thought were glorious
It is as though everything in the sky is surprised and dismayed/appalled about what you have done;
You, my people, have done two evil things:
You Israeli people, you were certainly not [RHQ] slaves when you were born;
Your enemies [MET] roared like lions,
Soldiers from Memphis and Tahpenes, cities in Egypt, have defeated you
But it is [RHQ] because you abandoned me, Yahweh,
So ◄why are you trying to make an alliance with [MET] the rulers of Egypt?/it certainly will not help you to make an alliance with the rulers of Egypt► [RHQ].
It is because you have been very wicked that I [PRS] will punish you.
Long ago, you stopped obeying me [MET], and you would not allow me to lead you [MET];
It is as though [MET] you were a grapevine that I planted
Your guilt from your sins is like [MET] very bad stains on a cloth,
You say that you have not sinned.
You are like wild female donkeys in the desert.
You constantly run here and there to find idols to worship, with the result that your sandals are worn out,
Yahweh says this:
You say to a piece of wood that is carved to become a sacred idol, ‘You are our father!’
Why do you not [RHQ] cry out to the gods that you made?
You complain that it was wrong for me not to have rescued you,
I punished some of you,
You people of Israel, pay attention to what I say.
A young woman would certainly never [RHQ] forget to wear her jewelry,
You know how to easily find gods from other countries whom you can love.
Although you have on your clothes the blood of poor people whom you have murdered,
you say ‘We have not done anything that is wrong;
Previously you requested the army of Assyria to help you,
They will capture you, and you will be their prisoners [MTY],
